title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Insights about people in profile cards now coming to Microsoft Teams

description.newValue:
Profile cards in Microsoft Teams will now surface insights and information such as birthdays, career changes, or pending meeting invites.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/notifications-and-insights-about-people-in-microsoft-apps-196cdd26-e5da-44ca-96f7-f33465633f4a
GA date: March CY2023
